Model

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is created in GameLogic and is responsible for its position, image ID, if there is a collision and also if there is darkness on the map. Every tile is painted with an image in the MapPanel.
    Version:
    2015-03-05
    Author:
    David Fogelberg

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile(int xPos,
            int yPos,
            java.lang.String imgID,
            boolean collision,
            boolean darkness)
        Parameters:
        xpos - The x position of the tile.
        ypos - The y position of the tile.
        imgID - The image ID that will be placed on the tile.
        collision - If there is a collision on the tile.
        darkness - If there is darkness on the tile.

    • Method Detail

      • getImgID

        public java.lang.String getImgID()
        Returns:
        The image ID of the tile.

      • setPlayer

        public void setPlayer(Player player)
        Parameters:
        player - The current player. Method sets this specific tile to the current player.

      • setEnemy

        public void setEnemy(Enemy enemy)
        Parameters:
        enemy - The current enemy. Method sets this specific tile to the current enemy.

      • setItem

        public void setItem(Item item)
        Parameters:
        item - The current item. Method sets this specific tile to the current item.

      • setDarkness

        public void setDarkness(boolean value)
        Parameters:
        value - The current darkness (true or false). Method sets this specific tile to the current darkness. If darkness is true then specific tile will be painted black.

      • setBlood

        public void setBlood(boolean value)
        Parameters:
        value - The current blood (true or false). Method sets this specific tile to the current blood. If blood is true then specific tile will be painted in blood.

      • getInterObj

        public InteractiveObject getInterObj()
        Returns:
        the specific interactive object, it is either player, enemy or item.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Method checks if the tile contains an interactive object.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • containsEnemy

        public boolean containsEnemy()
        Method checks if the tile contains an enemy object.
        Returns:
        true or false.

        Method checks if the tile contains an item object.
        Returns:
        true or false.

        public boolean containsDoor()

        Returns:
        true or false

        public boolean isDark()

        Returns:
        true or false.

        public boolean isBlood()

        Returns:

      • getCollision

        public boolean getCollision()
        Returns:
        true if there is a collision otherwise false

      • setDoor

        public void setDoor()
        Method sets the door object to true.

      • setImgID

        public void setImgID(java.lang.String imgID)
        Parameters:
        imgID - The current Image ID Method changes the current image ID to the new image ID.
